member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_NAME
member.summary: The LSA_TRANSLATED_NAME structure is used with the function to return information about the account identified by a .

summary.para: A value from the enumeration that identifies the type of SID.
If Use has one of the following values, one or both of the Name or DomainIndex members of LSA_TRANSLATED_NAME is not valid. These members are valid if Use has any other value.

listheader.description: The DomainIndex member is valid, but the Name member is not valid and must be ignored.
Both DomainIndex and Name are not valid and must be ignored.
Both DomainIndex and Name are not valid and must be ignored.
The Name member is valid, but the DomainIndex member is not valid and must be ignored.

member.name: LSA_TRANSLATED_NAME.Name
member.summary: An structure that contains the isolated name of the translated SID. An isolated name is a user, group, or local group account name without the domain name (for example, user_name, rather than Acctg\user_name).

summary.para: Specifies the zero-based index of an entry in the structure returned by the function. The entry contains the name and SID of the domain in which the account was found.
If there is no corresponding domain for an account, this member contains a negative value.
